The Bus is almost empty.
<<BREAK>>
A couple is sitting on the back row. They mutter words that can't quite be heard.
<<BREAK>>
 
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>

<<BREAK>>
It's a unusually smooth trip.
<<BREAK>>
Most stops are empty, so the driver doesnâ€™t bother stopping at them.
<<BREAK>>
They just sail on, guided by the orange lights on the sides of the street.
<<BREAK>>
 
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>

<<BREAK>>
 
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>
...
<<BREAK>>

<<BREAK>>
The couple has now got off the bus.
<<BREAK>>
They walk away from the stop.
<<BREAK>>
 
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>
...
<<BREAK>>
The night moves on.
<<BREAK>>
The sky is now dimly brightening.
<<BREAK>>
